items.title: HTidal 0.1.5 Beta released
items.summary: Today I've finished working on the Snapshot 5 release of the program. It has nothing revolutionary new, but the user experience has improved a lot (at least in my opinion) Changes: You'll receive the update automatically if you've added hrepo to your system. Otherwise,…
items.content_html:
Today I've finished working on the Snapshot 5 release of the program. It has nothing revolutionary new, but the user experience has improved a lot (at least in my opinion)

Changes:

  • Fixed minor bugs
  • Added new about section
  • Improved GUI usability
  • Updated deprecated code
  • Added play option to artist top/album/playlist views

You'll receive the update automatically if you've added hrepo to your system. Otherwise, you can download it manually.

items.title: HSuite v0.8.1 released
items.summary: Maintenance release for LTS v0.8. Changes: Added new Feedback option (HTidal) Improved development tools Added Publii, HTidal, VLC, Transmission and Meld Fixed theme releated problems Added own opera-codecs
items.content_html:
Maintenance release for LTS v0.8.

Changes:

  • Added new Feedback option (HTidal)
  • Improved development tools
  • Added Publii, HTidal, VLC, Transmission and Meld
  • Fixed theme releated problems
  • Added own opera-codecs

items.title: HTidal 0.1 Beta Released
items.summary: I'm glad to finally announce my newest project: HTidal! If you would like to read more about it or view it on GitHub, you can visit the project page of it. So let's talk about the release itself. It's the initial release of the…
items.content_html:
I'm glad to finally announce my newest project: HTidal! If you would like to read more about it or view it on GitHub, you can visit the project page of it.

So let's talk about the release itself. It's the initial release of the program, so don't expect it to be completely stable and ready. It has nearly 100% functionality (home screen is missing) and I've tested it, so there shouldn't be serious bugs in it. If you encounter any problems, or you have any ideas then feel free to provide your feedback. 

You can either download the DEB package or install it from my APT repo to get automatic updates.

items.title: Initial post
items.summary: As the title says it's the first post on this website, despite the site itself is up for a while now. So why am I posting it now? It has two reasons. The first is, that finally I think that this site is ready…
items.content_html:
As the title says it's the first post on this website, despite the site itself is up for a while now. So why am I posting it now? It has two reasons. The first is, that finally I think that this site is ready to go (at least in Beta), so I decided to create an "Initial commit". The second is, that it feels bad to have an empty homepage, so I had to create a first post anyway, and now, with the beginning of September it's the time for it.

From now on, I'll try to use this website as the main platform for my projects, and use GitHub as a "backend" only.
